title: A quote from Making Money
author: Terry Pratchett
description: It contained herbs and all natural ingredients. But belladonna was an herb, and arsenic was natural.
cleaned_text: "It contained herbs and all natural ingredients. But belladonna was an herb, and arsenic was natural."
